thread.title: Christopher Forster
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by Christopher Forster

author: Christopher Forster
title: Christopher Forster
text: As I am short sighted I had thought seeing anything beneath the waves was always going to be beyond me However after buying a decent mask in Gran Canaria and squeezing some old glasses beneath it I could see! Although with A slight water leak A call to Mikes resulted in me sending my mask to have prescription lenses fitted ,a free service and now I can see under water and no leaks !! I look forward now to snorkelling and maybe Scuba .Great advice and service Thanks Chris
